definition: to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon
to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"

sentences.english: Their mathematics test had questions on algebra and geometry.
sentences.chinese: 他们的数学考试有代数和几何方面的问题。

sentences.english: The meter reading will be the algebraic sum of all these sources.
sentences.chinese: 而电压表的读数则是所有这些源的代数和。

sentences.english: You know I would rather visit the dentist than study algebra and arithmetic!
sentences.chinese: 你知道我宁肯去看牙医也不愿意学习代数和算术。

sentences.english: Algebra and geometry are the two subjects at which the boy was completely incompetent at school.
sentences.chinese: 代数和几何是那个男孩读书时学得最差的两门课。

definition: rules of calculation (addition, subtraction, multiplication and division)/algorithm/fig. to scheme/to calculate (i.e. plot)
rational number (i.e. fraction of two integers, math.)
